1370: Radulphus was born in Helle voet in 1370.
Got married to Cecilia at age 19 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Cecilia, Gisele, at age 19.
1374: Had a son with Cecilia, Anthonius, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Folqui, at age 24.
1377: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Badeloghen, at age 26.
Lost daughter Folqui when Folqui was 3 years old.
1378: Had a son with Cecilia, Werenboud, at age 27.
1379: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Verthwi, at age 28.
1380: Lost son Werenboud when Werenboud was 3 years old.
1382: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Heylewigis, at age 31.
1385: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Diewiven, at age 34.
Lost daughter Diewiven when Diewiven was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Sipper, at age 36.
1392: Had a son with Cecilia, Rolekine, at age 41.
1395: Lost daughter Gisele when Gisele was 26 years old.
1396: Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 20 years old.
